price: Kò níí mú wọn sanra. Kò sì níí rọ̀ wọ́n lọ́rọ̀ nínú ebi.
arabic: لَّا يُسۡمِنُ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِن جُوعٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: lā yus'minu walā yugh'nī min jūʿin
